description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Test your wits and reflexes in 30 levels featuring a blend of puzzle and twitch, presented in an enhanced classic style. Place and rotate reflectors to guide bullets, find the human race a new home, and defeat the demon head Zomba in a poorly assembled plot line reminiscent of an era of poorly assembled plot lines! Features an original soundtrack by Terry L. Williams.
